players.name: Alice
memory: Charlie: "Since Diana was killed, she was likely town. Alice, why did you remain silent? We need everyone talking to find the mafia."
Bob: "Alice is the mafioso. I investigated her last night."
Charlie: "Bob, if you're the detective, why didn't you share your investigation result in the first discussion round when you had the chance?"
Bob: "I wanted to confirm my investigation before speaking. Alice's silence after my accusation confirms she's mafia."
